story.text: Jan 3 Goldman Sachs Group Inc. (GS.N) sold $2.25 billion in 10-year global subordinated notes on Wednesday, sole lead manager Goldman Sachs & Co. said. BORROWER: GOLDMAN SACHS GROUP INC. AMT $2.25 BLN COUPON 5.625 PCT MATURITY 1/15/2017 TYPE GLBL SUB NTS ISS PRICE 99.931 FIRST PAY 7/15/2007 MOODY'S A1 YIELD 5.634 PCT PAY FREQ SEMI-ANNUAL S&P A-PLUS SPREAD 96 BPS NON-CALLABLE FITCH A-PLUS MORE THAN TREAS
story.title: new issue - goldman sachs sells $ 2 . 25 bln 10 - yr notes
